com.ibm.webest.gui.utils
Class GranularityUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.webest.gui.utils.GranularityUtils

public class GranularityUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class to save a map of granularity questions with on granularity question to store the selected question in it.

Author:
Florian Friedrichs

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,GranularityQuestion> getMap()
